mapper.select: select warningid, boardtype, warningdate, warningcnt from warning
mapper.insert: insert into warning (boardtype, boardno, warningcnt, warningid, warningdate) values (#{boardtype}, #{boardno}, 1, #{warningid}, now())
mapper.select: select EXISTS (select * from warning where boardtype=#{boardtype} and boardno=#{boardno} limit 1) as success
select warningcnt from warning where boardtype=#{boardtype} and boardno=#{boardno}
mapper.update: update warning set warningcnt=warningcnt+1 where boardtype=#{boardtype } and boardno=#{boardno }
update warning set warningcnt=warningcnt-1 where boardtype=#{boardtype } and boardno=#{boardno }
mapper.delete: delete from warning where boardtype=#{boardtype } and boardno=#{boardno }
